thread.title: Great little hotel near Theater Districk
thread.title_full: Great little hotel near Theater Districk - Review of Distrikt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Richard B
title: Great little hotel near Theater Districk
text:
If you are thinking about a hotel in New York City and going to a show, we would recommend the Districk Hotel.
Just a few blocks...walking dististance to the Theater Dist. this hotel is smaller with only 5-6 rooms per floor but very nice ones.
There are a few nice bars just around the corner for a good night cap that are close.
